v8:item.v8:content: If you leave the "to" field blank, the schedule will be filled from the template till the end of the business calendar year.
When you change the business calendar, the work schedule is automatically filled for the specified period.
Select a template for filling the work schedule.
The length of the custom period that will be repeated throughout the year.
If you select the check box, days falling on holidays will be excluded from workdays.
If the check box is selected, days within non-work periods in the business calendar will be excluded from workdays.
The selected days will be added to the work schedule.
Indicates whether the day is included in the schedule.
The period to cover by the schedule.
To edit workdays and holidays in the calendar, double-click them.
